summary: Adding a spell that can transmute salt piles to void salts.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial][size=3][font=Arial][size=3]I made this mod for me because of the low availability of void salts. I think I should share more with the community, so here it is.[/size][/font]

This mod adds the [b]Transmute Void Salts[/b] spell to your game.
It's an alteration spell which transmutes 3 salt piles to one unit of void salts.
There can be found a spell tome in the embershard mine. "Search locked areas with tables".

Please report any bugs and suggestions improving mods.[/size][/font]
[font=Arial][size=2]Since I'm new to making mods I appreciate your advice and suggestion to make my mods friendlier for the lore.[/size][/font]
author: cray935
